name: Uno To Do App
description:
Uno To Do is a beautifully designed To Do app template using the latest Material Design 3 system. 

 

The template makes it easy to jump start, or to learn, Uno Platform-powered mobile, web and desktop applications. The app provides common functions such as logging on, recording tasks, adding due dates, setting reminders and more. At the same time, through its integration with Uno Platform it establishes the best practices for cross-platform application design and development considering multiple screen size, accessibility, enforcing brand guidelines and more.

 

Use Uno To Do template design together with Uno Platform for Figma plugin LivePreview feature to experience the app before even coding it. Export design assets and get clean, responsive XAML true to the way the app was designed.
